short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for converting textarea to code editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension for converting textarea to code editor.
Very useful in google app engine interactive console, jenkins job configuration page and any other page, where you need to type code in textarea.

Opensource - https://github.com/nvbn/textarea-to-code-editor
Written in clojurescript.
